row.process:
:SET &runid# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :PRINT " Exécution de la copy client &SCLIENT# vers &CCLIENT#"
:SET &DELETE_WORK_FILES#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"DELETE_WORK_FILES") :SET &MESSAGES#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"MESSAGES") :SET &OBJECTS#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"OBJECTS") :SET &RESET_PASSWORD#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"RESET_PASSWORD") :SET &STATISTIQUES_REPORTS#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"STATISTIQUES_REPORTS") :SET &VERSION_OBJECTS#=STR_FIND(&OPTIONS#,"VERSION_OBJECTS")
:PRINT "OPTIONS:" :SET &OPTIONS_CMD#="" :IF &DELETE_WORK_FILES# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -W ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+DELETE_WORK_FILES" :ENDIF :IF &MESSAGES# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -M ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+MESSAGES" :ENDIF :IF &OBJECTS# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -O ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+OBJECTS" :ENDIF :IF &RESET_PASSWORD# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -R ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+RESET_PASSWORD" :ENDIF :IF &STATISTIQUES_REPORTS# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -A ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+STATISTIQUES_REPORTS" :ENDIF :IF &VERSION_OBJECTS# <> "0" : SET &TMP#=STR_CAT(&OPTIONS_CMD#," -V ") : SET &OPTIONS_CMD#=&TMP# : PRINT "+VERSION_OBJECTS" :ENDIF
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# set rc=0
echo ************************************* echo Exécution de la copy client : echo ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -C -S&SCLIENT# -T&CCLIENT# &OPTIONS_CMD# echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -C -S&SCLIENT# -T&CCLIENT# &OPTIONS_CMD# set rc=%errorlevel%
@set retcode=%rc% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" cd &PATH_UTILITY#
echo "*************************************" echo "Exécution de la copy client :" echo "./ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -C -S&SCLIENT# -T&CCLIENT# &OPTIONS_CMD#" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbcc -V -LE -B -C -S&SCLIENT# -T&CCLIENT# &OPTIONS_CMD# rc=$? exit $rc :OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process:
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# !:INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_AUDIT, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE !:INC JOBI.ALIAS, NOFOUND=IGNORE !
:SET &erreur# = "NON" :PRINT "" :PRINT " Source = &SCLIENT# destination = &COPIE#"
:IF "Y" = ISNUMERIC(&COPIE#) : SET &base_client# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.SQLI.CLIENT.LIST) : PROCESS &base_client# : SET &exist_client# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&base_client#,1) !: p &exist_client# : IF &exist_client# = &COPIE# : PRINT " Client source = &SCLIENT# - Client cible = &COPIE#" : PRINT " Le Client Cible existe déjà, copie impossible" : SET &erreur# = "OUI" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : IF &erreur# = "OUI" : PRINT " ERREUR - Client cible existant dans copie client" : STOP MSG, 50, "ERREUR - Client cible existant dans copie client" : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &erreur# = "OUI" : PRINT "ERREUR - Client cible non numérique" : STOP MSG, 50, "ERREUR - Client cible non numérique" :ENDIF
:SET &CCLIENT# = FORMAT(&COPIE#,"0000") :PRINT " Client copie vers &CCLIENT#"
